verses.text: \w As|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2532"\w* \w passed|strong="G3855"\w* \w by|strong="G1537"\w*, \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w saw|strong="G3708"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w man|strong="G5185"\w* \w who|strong="G2532"\w* \w had|strong="G2532"\w* \w been|strong="G2532"\w* \w blind|strong="G5185"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w his|strong="G2532"\w* \w birth|strong="G1079"\w*.

\wj “\+w Neither|strong="G3777"\+w* \+w the|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w man|strong="G3778"\+w* \+w nor|strong="G3777"\+w* \+w the|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w parents|strong="G1118"\+w*,”\wj* replied \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \wj “\+w but|strong="G2316"\+w* \+w he|strong="G3778"\+w* \+w was|strong="G3588"\+w* born blind \+w so|strong="G2443"\+w* \+w that|strong="G2443"\+w* \+w the|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w work|strong="G2041"\+w* \+w of|strong="G2316"\+w* \+w God|strong="G2316"\+w* \+w should|strong="G2316"\+w* \+w be|strong="G2316"\+w* \+w made|strong="G5319"\+w* plain \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w him|strong="G3588"\+w*.\wj*

\wj \+w As|strong="G1722"\+w* long \+w as|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w I|strong="G3752"\+w* \+w am|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w the|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w world|strong="G2889"\+w*, \+w I|strong="G3752"\+w* \+w am|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w the|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w light|strong="G5457"\+w* \+w of|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w the|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w world|strong="G2889"\+w*.”\wj*

\w Saying|strong="G3004"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w*, \w Jesus|strong="G3004"\w* \w spat|strong="G4429"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w ground|strong="G5476"\w*, \w made|strong="G4160"\w* \w some|strong="G3588"\w* paste \w with|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* saliva, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w put|strong="G4160"\w* \w it|strong="G2532"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w man|strong="G3778"\w*’s \w eyes|strong="G3788"\w*.

“Yes,” \w some|strong="G3778"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, “\w it|strong="G3754"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w*”; \w while|strong="G1510"\w* \w others|strong="G3754"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, “\w No|strong="G3780"\w*, \w but|strong="G3778"\w* \w he|strong="G3754"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w like|strong="G3664"\w* \w him|strong="G1565"\w*.” \w The|strong="G3754"\w* \w man|strong="G3778"\w* \w himself|strong="G1565"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, “\w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w am|strong="G1510"\w* \w he|strong="G3754"\w*.”

“\w How|strong="G4459"\w* \w did|strong="G3767"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w* get \w your|strong="G3588"\w* \w sight|strong="G3788"\w*, \w then|strong="G3767"\w*?” \w they|strong="G3588"\w* \w asked|strong="G3004"\w*.

“\w Where|strong="G4226"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w*?” \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w asked|strong="G3004"\w*. “\w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w do|strong="G1492"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w know|strong="G1492"\w*,” \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w answered|strong="G3004"\w*.

\w His|strong="G3754"\w* \w parents|strong="G1118"\w* \w spoke|strong="G3004"\w* \w in|strong="G1096"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w way|strong="G5100"\w* \w because|strong="G3754"\w* \w they|strong="G3588"\w* \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w afraid|strong="G5399"\w* \w of|strong="G5100"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* authorities; \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* authorities \w had|strong="G3588"\w* \w already|strong="G2235"\w* \w agreed|strong="G4934"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w*, \w if|strong="G1437"\w* \w anyone|strong="G5100"\w* \w should|strong="G5100"\w* \w acknowledge|strong="G3670"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G3004"\w* \w as|strong="G1096"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w he|strong="G3754"\w* \w should|strong="G5100"\w* \w be|strong="G1096"\w* expelled \w from|strong="G3588"\w* \w their|strong="G3588"\w* synagogues.

\w This|strong="G3778"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w why|strong="G1223"\w* \w his|strong="G1223"\w* \w parents|strong="G1118"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* ‘\w He|strong="G3754"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w old|strong="G2192"\w* enough; \w ask|strong="G1905"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w*.’
